I have no idea what the story was

Welcome to souls! Now spend the rest of the year researching the lore,  item descriptions and theories and then coping with the fact that you'll never know or understand all of it.

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552b1a366368723e38a50100#post_552b1a366368723e38a50100
Thing is, even Dark Souls 1 and 2, as complex as they were, still had comprehensible stories


Bloodborne starts off with were-wolf curse going around, to Eldritch gods and shit
And none of the endings seem to have a satisfying conclusion
